base_url.title: Base URL
base_url.description: The base URL of the DocuSign environment. For example, https://demo.docusign.net/restapi/v2/accounts/<your-account-id>

user_name.title: User Name
user_name.description: The business User's name on behalf of which API calls will be made

password.title: User Password
password.description: The business User's password on behalf of which API calls will be made

integrator_key.title: Integrator Key
integrator_key.description: The Integrator Key used when making API calls to DocuSign

application_name.title: Application Name
application_name.description: The name of the Application CR where the REST APIS should be registered for consumption

event_gw_ba_user.title: Event Gateway Basic Auth User
event_gw_ba_user.description: Provide this in the DocuSign Admin console for basic authentication to connect the event gateway

event_gw_ba_password.title: Event Gateway Basic Auth Password
event_gw_ba_password.description: Provide this in the DocuSign Admin console for basic authentication to connect the event gateway
